short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that tracks your scroll position and recommends content to read.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Doomscroller is your personal assistant for healthier social media habits on X (formerly Twitter). In today's fast-paced digital world, it's easy to fall into the trap of endless scrolling, consuming content without purpose. 

Doomscroller is here to help you regain control of your online time and make your X experience more meaningful.
